Checks whether a specified port is occupied.

Parameters:
port - - port to check.
Returns:
- true if port is occupied

isPortsOccupied

public static boolean isPortsOccupied(List<Integer> portList)
isPortsOccupied will repeatedly test the connection to the ports defined in the groovy configuration file to see whether the ports are open. Having all the tested ports opened means that the process has completed loading successfully and is up and running.

Throws:
org.cloudifysource.dsl.internal.DSLException

isHttpURLAvailable

public static boolean isHttpURLAvailable(String url)
Executes an HTTP GET Request to the given URL, using a one second connect timeout and read timeout.

Parameters:
url - the HTTP URL.
Returns:
the HTTP return code. If an error occured while sending the request, for instance if a connection could not be made, returns 500

                                    int connectTimeout,

Executes an HTTP GET Request to the given URL.

Parameters:
url - the HTTP URL.
connectTimeout - the connection timeout.
readTimeout - the read timeout.
Returns:
the HTTP return code. If an error occured while sending the request, for instance if a connection could not be made, returns 500
